events.title: v0 Prompt to Production ‚Äî Seattle [Vercel x AI Collective]
events.description:
We're bringing Vercel's global "Prompt to Production" event to Seattle for the very first time. Think of it as a hands-on build session where you'll take an idea and ship an actual, live application in one evening using v0.
When & Where:
Date: Thursday, 05 February 2026
Time: 3:00pm - 5:00pm
Location: Comotion Labs @ Startup Hall
What's happening:
This is very much a doing session. Whether you're testing out a startup idea or exploring AI tooling, you'll walk away with something deployed and live.
You'll learn how to use v0 to generate UI components quickly and combine them with modern frameworks to build faster
Everyone gets free credits to use v0 during the session
Whatever gets built enters a global showcase - the v0 team picks winners who get featured in the community plus some swag
Schedule:
3:00pm ‚Äî Welcome, quick v0 intro video
3:30pm ‚Äî Start building (we'll have some prompt ideas if you need them)
4:30pm ‚Äî Show what you made + community voting
5:00pm ‚Äî Wrap up, photos, hang out
Who should come?
Anyone curious about this space. Frontend devs, founders prototyping, students, people exploring AI and web development. If you want to see what building with AI tools actually looks like in practice, come through.
What to bring: If you're joining in person bring your laptop and a kickass idea!

Please be advised: Unfortunately, space is very limited at these community events and we can not always accept everyone we would like to. If you are not accepted to this event, please keep applying! We appreciate your application tremendously and we are looking forward to seeing you at a future event very soon!
The AI Collective is a global non-profit building the human layer for the AI age. We unite 150,000+ leaders, builders, and stakeholders across 100+ forums worldwide to democratize the frontier, build trust, and coordinate how society navigates the rapid acceleration of technological progress.
All attendees and organizers at events affiliated with The AI Collective agree to our privacy policy and are subject to our code of conduct.

events.title: üß† The AI Collective Seattle x Innomat AI | The Robotic AI Revolution
events.description:
AI x Robotics: Building the Future of Manufacturing
Hosted by The AI Collective & InnoMat.AI
üìç Northeastern University | 225 Terry Ave N, Seattle, WA 98109
üìÖ Thursday, November 13, 2025 | üïî 5:00 PM ‚Äì 7:00 PM

üîß Where Cutting-Edge Tech Meets Real-World Deployment
Join us for an evening that brings together researchers, founders, and investors working at the frontier of AI and robotics for physical industries. This event focuses on the real challenges and real opportunities of building and scaling intelligent systems for manufacturing, construction, and infrastructure.
You'll hear from top minds in computer vision, human-robot interaction, optimization, deep tech investing, and AI product leadership‚Äîincluding voices from Northeastern, UW, Qualcomm, Broadcom, InnoMat.AI, and Madrona Venture Group.
Agenda
5.00 pm | Door opens
5.30 pm | Welcome - The AI Collective & Northeastern University
6:00 pm | Innomat AI Presentation
6:15 pm | Dinner & Snack Break
6.30 pm | Fireside chat - Modern Manufacturing: From Research to Deployment
7.30 pm | Networking

üé§ Featured Speakers
Dr. Joseph Weber ‚Äì Director of ECE, Northeastern University Seattle | Computer Vision Scientist
Dr. Xian Li ‚Äì Professor of ECE | Expert in Human-Robot Collaboration
Dr. L√©onard Boussioux ‚Äì Professor at UW Foster | MIT PhD in General AI & Optimization
Rolanda Fu ‚Äì Investor at Madrona | Investing in Tech & AI Companies
Neel Kishan ‚Äì AI GTM & Product Lead at Qualcomm
Charlie Sun ‚Äì Founder of InnoMat.AI | Machine Learning Lead
Bhola Chhetri ‚Äì Solutions Architect at Broadcom | Moderator, The AI Collective

üí° What You‚Äôll Experience
üöÄ Deep Dives on Applied Robotics & AI
How real-world robotics systems are built, validated, and deployed‚Äîat scale and under constraints.
üí¨ Fireside Discussion: From Lab to Market
From breakthrough research to venture-backed startups, learn how these leaders navigate the technical, business, and product challenges in industrial AI.
üìà Investor Perspective: What‚Äôs Fundable in Industrial Robotics?
Hear directly from Madrona about how they evaluate frontier-tech startups‚Äîand where the real opportunities lie in hardware + AI.
ü§ù Curated Networking
Connect with a hand-picked group of technical founders, researchers, engineers, and early-stage investors.

üë• Who Should Attend
Robotics founders and deep tech startup teams
ML/AI engineers working on perception, simulation, or autonomous systems
VCs and innovation teams tracking industrial applications of AI
Professors, PhDs, and students focused on robotics, hardware, or embedded intelligence
Industry pros modernizing operations in manufacturing or infrastructure

üçï Food and drinks provided. 
This is not your average AI meetup. It‚Äôs a conversation between the builders, funders, and visionaries shaping what comes next.
Please be advised: Unfortunately, space is very limited at these community events and we can not always accept everyone we would like to. If you are not accepted to this event, please keep applying! We appreciate your application tremendously and we are looking forward to seeing you at a future event very soon!

InnoMat.AI, founded by Northeastern alum Charlie Sun, is redefining how inspections are performed in manufacturing and construction. Leveraging advanced AI and robotics, InnoMat.AI‚Äôs platform automates the full inspection lifecycle‚Äîfrom defect detection and material validation to workflow guidance and real-time reporting. By turning manual processes into intelligent, data-driven operations, InnoMat.AI empowers engineers to make faster, more accurate decisions‚Äîimproving quality, reducing downtime, and driving performance across industrial systems.

The AI Collective is a global non-profit community uniting 100,000+ pioneers ‚Äì founders, researchers, operators, and investors ‚Äì exploring the frontier of AI in major tech hubs worldwide. Through events, workshops, and community-led research, we empower the AI ecosystem to collaboratively steer AI‚Äôs future toward trust, openness, and human flourishing.
All attendees and organizers at events affiliated with The AI Collective agree to our privacy policy and are subject to our code of conduct.
